## verifyConditions() function

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Verifies that the plugin can run successfully.

This hook checks: - Declaration file can be found - Git repository is accessible

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function verifyConditions(pluginConfig: PluginConfig, context: SemanticReleaseContext): void;
```

## Exceptions
